Text:
thank you Ray

and will everyone please remember this is not a scene release

set your torrent client to "force seed"
Thanks again from up North RayCort.  We'd never see this in our neck of da woods.  Much appreciated.
Raycort>Thank you for the extra effort in reseeding the torrent. One of my favorite uploaders :)

Thank you Ray! You're the best. I copied the original file into the new folder, renamed it the new file and forced a recheck. I now have it 100%. I recopied it into the old file and now I am reseeding both. 
The seeding is going slow on both, but I will keep it seeding for 5 hours. I will have to shut my computer down since it overheats. 
I will come back later this evening and start seeding again overnight.

@CarolR, I appreciate your willing to seed. If only others would follow your lead then I would not be so upset at those Hit and Run people. I know some that download my torrent are learning to seed and share, so thanks to all who care enough to seed!
Thank you so much. Highly appreciated.
@RayCort Thanks so much for the ReSeed. I will seed back 1 to 1, always do!!!!
@RayCort Thanks I now have 100% and am seeding back 1 to 1 !!!!

since many people dl this (and others) from the mirrored sites (KAT, aha, extra , new, etc) try putting a request to seed in your torrent description.

they mirror both the torrent and the description.  

I am almost at 100% seeding, but I will continue to seed for another 8 hours or so,when it will be burned to dvd.
I seeded 4.33 GB hope that helps!!!

Can someone please post what my settings should be on uTorrent so I give back (seeding) the right way. I downloaded the reseed as the original stopped around 59% but have been seeding since yesterday and don't know which column or numbers to look at to know when I've done my part. Now, when you answer, pretend I am torrent illiterate as I set up uTorrent according to some website showing the optimal settings. Thanks again, RayCort, for reseeding :)
Have you tried removing and readding the torrent?
